items.title: Hello there!
items.text: Welcome to my portfolio, I am a Computer Science student studying at Langara in Vancouver B.C. Canada. In the past I have worked as a front-end developer and graphic designer, but I am also interested in other areas of computing and programming. I'm always creating and learning new things, so I'll be frequently updating this portfolio. If you like what you see and would like to talk, please send me a message!

items: JavaScript - TypeScript, Node, NPM, Webpack, Parcel, Express, React, Phaser, Babylon, Canvas
